channel.title: Must either be a string or None. Got \"list\"."
channel.description:
Hi All,
The publish statement assigned the output as a list to a variable and the next task is expecting string type instead of the LIST. Is it possible to convert the output from LIST to STRING.
Please help me if anyone worked this kind of requirement.
Thanks and Regards, Ramesh

item.title: Must either be a string or None. Got \"list\"."
item.dc:creator: rameshar16
item.description:
Thank you @Bryan for your help.

Read full topic
item.source: Must either be a string or None. Got \"list\"."

item.title: Must either be a string or None. Got \"list\"."
item.dc:creator: Bryan
item.description:
Jinja:
param: {{ ctx().foo | string }}
Yaql:
param: <% ctx().foo.join("") %>
